Updating costs to US 2018$ values using the medical cost component of the Consumer Price Index
- unadjusted index Dec 2009 = 379.516
- unadjusted index Jan 2018 = 513.135

```{r}
cpi <- ((513.135 - 379.516)/379.516) + 1
```
